title: How to Put a GUI on Ansible, Using Semaphore
author: Jack Wallen
description: Ansible can be great for automating routine IT tasks, but some may feel stymied by the command line. Here's how to install the Semaphore graphical user interface.
cntitle: 如何使用 Semaphore 在 Ansible 上添加 GUI
cndescription: Ansible 非常适合自动化日常 IT 任务，但有些人可能会因命令行而感到受阻。以下是如何安装 Semaphore 图形用户界面。
